title: What is the longest song you enjoy listening to? - Quora

response.answer_text: Shine On You Crazy Diamond part 1, at 13 minutes. The full song is a bit too long for my attention, but part 1 holds my attention perfectly with four distinct yet smooth movements. And Shine isn’t an outlier either. Ancora is at 12 minutes, while Song of the North is 11 minutes. So yeah, I do like long songs, but it’s hard to consistently create them.
Viola Lee Blues, Grateful Dead from 5/2/70. It’s just under 17 minutes long, and is 10 minutes of collective improvisation with 5 minutes of actual singing (maybe even less haha.)
